name: Tatarun
description:
Welcome in the Tatarun!

You are free to explore all the Stages of the facility but be careful, only the best can survive.

let me explain the basics:

In the MainMenu - press "CONTROLS" to see how you move and do things.

You are one of our "Guests"   and have to get out of the Tatarun

There are some Obstacles to fight on your way  

use switches to change the Enviroment 

The Exit  will be locked. Find the Key 

If you need Equipment you better gether some Crystals  

You can spend them at the Storemachnies 

If you feel not healthy, try and find a Medipack  maybe it saves you?

If you defeat the guardian, you are free to go!

Have a nice time... in the Tatarun!

And Last:

can you beat my Stats?

I used Art Asset from: https://qbe-e.itch.io/mcr-sci-fi-1 and added on my own.
